articles.author: Kate Dennett
articles.title: Priyanka Chopra is supported by husband Nick Jonas at the premiere of her series Citadel - Daily Mail
articles.description: The actress, 40, cut an elegant figure as she joined her fellow cast members to celebrate the upcoming release of her Amazon Prime Video series.
articles.content:
Priyanka Chopra looked effortlessly glamorous as she stepped out with her husband Nick Jonas at the premiere of her new spy series Citadel on Tuesday.
